attributes.action: Impose a lockdown for the unvaccinated and introduce vaccine passports
attributes.additional_details: As we have seen in Europe COVID19 cases are rising fast putting pressure on health services and hospitals and if we do not act now well see a surge in covid cases here that could put pressure on our health services and hospitals that could disrupt Christmas plans and plunge us into a lockdown in the new year putting businesses and the country into bankruptcy.
attributes.background: To stop the surge in coronavirus cases we must act now to contain the spread and keep hospitals from being overwhelmed by covid. This will mean the reimposing of restrictions like masks and social distancing, closing offices and nightclubs and mandating vaccines and speed on how they are rolled out.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the Covid-19 outbreal, but we're not sure what restrictions you want to be imposed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Enact ‘Plan B’ to help keep people and our NHS well this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599507
